import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Card, Button, Form } from "react-bootstrap"; import data from "../MOCK_DATA" export default function LoginForm() { const [details, setDetails] = useState({ password: "", email: "" }); const [user, setUser] = useState({name:""}); function login(){ const {password, email} = details; if(!password || !email){ console.log("Please enter a password or email"); return; } const user = data.filter(user => user.password === password && user.email === email)[0]; if(!user){ console.log("No user found"); return; } console.log(user); } return (
